00065 /**
00066 * @brief Write begin of the file(Atoms and interactions) with the Easyspin format.
00067 */
00068 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::WriteHeader()
00069 {
00070         String ^ FileText=gcnew String("");
00071         ArrayList ^ A=gcnew ArrayList();
00072         ArrayList ^ Q=gcnew ArrayList();
00073         bool qflag=false;
00074         bool hflag=false;
00075 
00076         //Initial Name etc
00077         FileText="clear Sys Exp Opt; \r\n";
00078         FileText+="Sys.S=1/2; \r\n";
00079 
00080         //Loop over all interactions
00081         for each(int i in InteractionCollection->Keys)
00082         {
00083                 //Write nucleus and HFC
00084                 if(((Interaction^)InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::HFC)
00085                 {
00086                         hflag=true;
00087                         String ^ astring=gcnew String("");
00088 			::Matrix3x3^ matrix3x3=TransformToLab(((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i]));
00089 
00090                         //Convert to Mhz through matlab mt2mhz
00091                         astring="Sys = nucspinadd(Sys, "+"\'"+
00092                                 ((Interaction^ )InteractionCollection[i])->A->isotope->Mass+
00093                                 ((Interaction^ )InteractionCollection[i])->A->isotope->Element+"\', mt2mhz( [";
00094 
00095                         //Write matrix
00096                         astring+=
00097                                 To_String(matrix3x3[0]/10.0f)+", "+
00098                                 To_String(matrix3x3[1]/10.0f)+", "+
00099                                 To_String(matrix3x3[2]/10.0f)+"; "+
00100                                 To_String(matrix3x3[3]/10.0f)+", "+
00101                                 To_String(matrix3x3[4]/10.0f)+", "+
00102                                 To_String(matrix3x3[5]/10.0f)+"; "+
00103                                 To_String(matrix3x3[6]/10.0f)+", "+
00104                                 To_String(matrix3x3[7]/10.0f)+", "+
00105                                 To_String(matrix3x3[8]/10.0f)+" ] )";
00106 
00107                         //Add to the final string
00108                         A->Add(astring);
00109                 };
00110 
00111                 //Write quadropolar
00112                 if(((Interaction^)InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Quadrupolar)
00113                 {
00114                         qflag=true;
00115                         String ^ qstring=gcnew String("");
00116 			::Matrix3x3^ matrix3x3=TransformToLab(((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i]));
00117 
00118                         //Write matrix
00119                         qstring=", [";
00120                         qstring+=
00121                                 To_String(matrix3x3[0])+", "+
00122                                 To_String(matrix3x3[1])+", "+
00123                                 To_String(matrix3x3[2])+"; "+
00124                                 To_String(matrix3x3[3])+", "+
00125                                 To_String(matrix3x3[4])+", "+
00126                                 To_String(matrix3x3[5])+"; "+
00127                                 To_String(matrix3x3[6])+", "+
00128                                 To_String(matrix3x3[7])+", "+
00129                                 To_String(matrix3x3[8])+" ];";
00130 
00131                         //Add to the final string
00132                         Q->Add(qstring);
00133                 };
00134 
00135                 //Write G-Tensor
00136                 if(((Interaction^)InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::GTensor)
00137                 {
00138 			::Matrix3x3^ matrix3x3=TransformToLab(((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i]));
00139                         FileText+="Sys.g = ["+
00140                                 To_String(matrix3x3[0])+", "+
00141                                 To_String(matrix3x3[1])+", "+
00142                                 To_String(matrix3x3[2])+"; "+
00143                                 To_String(matrix3x3[3])+", "+
00144                                 To_String(matrix3x3[4])+", "+
00145                                 To_String(matrix3x3[5])+"; "+
00146                                 To_String(matrix3x3[6])+", "+
00147                                 To_String(matrix3x3[7])+", "+
00148                                 To_String(matrix3x3[8])+" "+
00149                                 "];\r\n";
00150                 };
00151 
00152                 //Write Zero-Splitting
00153                 if(((Interaction^)InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::ZFS)
00154                 {
00155                         //Transform to Mhz
00156                         Unit^ funit=Units::MHz;
00157 			::Matrix3x3^ matrix3x3=TransformToLab(((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i]));
00158                         double con=funit->fromSI(((Tensor^)InteractionCollection[i])->unit->toSI(1.0f));
00159 
00160                         //Write matrix
00161                         FileText+="Sys.D = ["+
00162                                 To_String(con*matrix3x3[0])+", "+
00163                                 To_String(con*matrix3x3[1])+", "+
00164                                 To_String(con*matrix3x3[2])+"; "+
00165                                 To_String(con*matrix3x3[3])+", "+
00166                                 To_String(con*matrix3x3[4])+", "+
00167                                 To_String(con*matrix3x3[5])+"; "+
00168                                 To_String(con*matrix3x3[6])+", "+
00169                                 To_String(con*matrix3x3[7])+", "+
00170                                 To_String(con*matrix3x3[8])+" "+
00171                                 "];\r\n";
00172                 };
00173         };
00174 
00175         //If HFC exist and quadropolar exist combine them.
00176         if(hflag)  for(int i=0;i<A->Count;i++) FileText+=A[i]+(qflag? (String ^ )Q[i] : "); \r\n");     
00177         else //else write atom collection alone
00178         {
00179                 FileText+="Sys.Nucs= "+"\'";
00180 
00181                 //Loop over all atoms
00182                 for each(int i in AtomCollection->Keys) 
00183                 {
00184                         //Write all atoms except electrons
00185                         if(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Element!="e") 
00186                                 FileText+=(i==1? (String ^ )"" : (String ^ )", ")+
00187                                           ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Mass+
00188                                           ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Element;
00189                 };
00190 
00191                 FileText+= "\';  \r\n";
00192 
00193                 //Write the quadropolar couplings if exist
00194                 if(qflag)
00195                 {
00196                         for(int i=0;i<Q->Count;i++) FileText+="Sys.Q=" + (String ^ )Q[i] +"\r\n";
00197                 };
00198 
00199         };
00200 
00201         //Write in the final string
00202         PreviewtextBox->Text=FileText+"\r\n";
00203 }

00205 /**
00206 * @brief Write end of the file(Parameters) with the  Easyspin format.
00207 */
00208 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::WriteFooter()
00209 {
00210         String ^ FileText=gcnew String("");
00211 
00212         //Write the Header for the parameters
00213         if (easyspinfunction==0) //garlic
00214         {
00215                 FileText+="\r\n garlic(Sys,Exp,Opt);";
00216         }
00217         else if (easyspinfunction==1) //chili
00218         {
00219                 FileText+="\r\n chili(Sys,Exp,Opt);";
00220         }
00221         else if (easyspinfunction==2) //pepper
00222         {
00223                 FileText+="\r\n pepper(Sys,Exp,Opt);";
00224         };
00225 
00226         //write all the parameters strings
00227         PreviewtextBox->Text+=experimentstring;
00228         PreviewtextBox->Text+=experiment1string;
00229         PreviewtextBox->Text+=experiment2string;
00230         PreviewtextBox->Text+=symmetrystring;
00231         PreviewtextBox->Text+=optionstring;
00232         PreviewtextBox->Text+=option1string;
00233         PreviewtextBox->Text+=option2string;
00234         PreviewtextBox->Text+=broadeningstring;
00235         PreviewtextBox->Text+=broadening1string;
00236         PreviewtextBox->Text+=dynamicstring;
00237         PreviewtextBox->Text+=dynamic1string;
00238         PreviewtextBox->Text+=FileText;
00239 
00240 
00241         int maxWidth=0;
00242         int fontsize=11;
00243 
00244         //Find the maximum line width
00245         for(int i=0;i<PreviewtextBox->Lines->Length;i++) 
00246                 if(PreviewtextBox->Lines[i]->Length>maxWidth) maxWidth=PreviewtextBox->Lines[i]->Length;
00247 
00248         //Change the size of the preview panel
00249         PreviewtextBox->Width=fontsize*maxWidth;
00250         PreviewtextBox->Height=PreviewtextBox->Lines->Length*(fontsize+7);
00251 }

00255 /**
00256 * @brief Convert units of a quantity.
00257 * @param value The number to convert. String form to double.
00258 * @param result The unit we want to convert to.
00259 * @param selected The initially unit in string form.
00260 * result The converted number in string form.
00261 */
00262 String^ SpinachGUI::EasySpin::unitconv(String^ value, Unit^ result, String^ selected)
00263 {
00264         //Set the initial unit
00265         Unit^ unit;
00266         if (selected=="ns" ) unit=Units::nsec;
00267         else if (selected=="mTesla" ) unit=Units::mTesla;
00268         else if (selected=="Gauss" ) unit=Units::Gauss;
00269         else if (selected=="MHz" ) unit=Units::MHz;
00270         else if (selected=="GHz" ) unit=Units::GHz;
00271         else if (selected=="Hz" ) unit=Units::Hz;
00272         else if (selected=="Seconds" ) unit=Units::seconds;
00273         else  unit=Units::mi_sec;/*if (selected=="?s" )*/
00274 
00275         
00276         double nvalue;
00277         //Convert number to SI units
00278         if(value=="") return ""; 
00279         else nvalue=unit->toSI(Convert::ToDouble(value));
00280 
00281         //Convert to final unit
00282         return Convert::ToString(result->fromSI(nvalue));
00283 }

00363 /**
00364 * @brief EventHandler for Export button of EasySpin 
00365 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00366 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00367 */
00368 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::Exportbutton_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) 
00369 {               
00370         //Setting the format and initialize filename for the save dialoguebox 
00371         saveFileDialog->Filter="EasySpin File|*.m";
00372         saveFileDialog->FileName=Path::GetFileNameWithoutExtension(CurrentTitleFile)+".m";
00373 
00374         //Opens the save dialogue box and check if the OK button clicked then save to file
00375         if (saveFileDialog->ShowDialog() == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::OK )
00376         {        
00377                 //Create export file
00378                 FileStream^ fs=gcnew FileStream(saveFileDialog->FileName,FileMode::Create );
00379 
00380                 //Convert and write to file
00381                 array<Byte>^ info = (gcnew UTF8Encoding( true ))->GetBytes( PreviewtextBox->Text);
00382                 fs->Write( info, 0, info->Length  );
00383 
00384                 fs->Close();
00385         };
00386 }

00392 /**
00393 * @brief EventHandler for top text boxes in Experiment tab
00394 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00395 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00396 */
00397 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::ExperimenttextBoxKeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
00398 {
00399         //Clear the string
00400         experimentstring="";
00401 
00402         //If key pressed is not number, or . or backspace or enter do nothing
00403         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
00404         {
00405                 e->Handled = true;
00406         }
00407         else
00408         {
00409                 //When enter is hitted
00410                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13)
00411                 {
00412                         //Returned to original color of the textbox
00413                         ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
00414 
00415                         //If one the Center and Sweep text fields is not empty, update text field
00416                         if(Centertext->Text!="" && Sweeptext->Text!="")
00417                         {
00418                                 //Write the center-sweep parameters after convertion to proper units
00419                                 experimentstring="Exp.CenterSweep = ["+unitconv(Centertext->Text,Units::mTesla,ExpUnitscombo->Text)+
00420                                         " "+ unitconv(Sweeptext->Text,Units::mTesla,ExpUnitscombo->Text)+"];\r\n";
00421                         }
00422                         else //If one the min-max text fields is not empty, update text field
00423                         {
00424                                 if(Minimumtext->Text!="" && Maximumtext->Text!="")
00425 
00426                                         //Write the min-max parameters after convertion to proper units
00427                                                 experimentstring="Exp.Range = ["+unitconv(Minimumtext->Text,Units::mTesla,ExpUnitscombo->Text)+
00428                                                 " "+ unitconv(Maximumtext->Text,Units::mTesla,ExpUnitscombo->Text)+"];\r\n"; 
00429                         }
00430 
00431                         //Write the microwave frequence value in the aproppriate format
00432                         experimentstring+="Exp.mwFreq = "+ Frequencytext->Text+";\r\n";
00433 
00434                         //Write the Phase(degrees) value in the aproppriate format
00435                         experimentstring+="Exp.mwPhase = "+ Phasetext->Text+";\r\n";
00436 
00437                         //Write the Mod amp value in the aproppriate format
00438                         experimentstring+=(ModcheckBox->Checked? "Exp.ModAmp = "+
00439                                 unitconv(Modetext->Text,Units::mTesla,ModUnitscombo->Text)+";\r\n" : "");
00440 
00441                         //Update the final strings
00442                         WriteHeader();
00443                         WriteFooter();
00444 
00445                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
00446                 else ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
00447         };
00448 }

00534 /**
00535 * @brief EventHandler for crystal symmetry parameter in Experiment tab
00536 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00537 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00538 */
00539 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::CrystalSymmetryBoxKeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
00540 {
00541         //Clear the string
00542         symmetrystring="";
00543         Int32 test; 
00544 
00545         //If key pressed is not number, or . or backspace or enter do nothing
00546         if (!Char::IsLetterOrDigit(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '/' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
00547         {
00548                 e->Handled = true;
00549         }
00550         else
00551         {
00552                 //When enter is hitted and pepper is enabled
00553                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13 && easyspinfunction==2)
00554                 {
00555                         //Write crystal symmetry parameter parameters in correct format
00556                         symmetrystring="Exp.CrystalSymmetry = "+ 
00557                                 (Int32::TryParse(CrystalSymmetrytext->Text, test)?
00558                                 CrystalSymmetrytext->Text : "'"+CrystalSymmetrytext->Text+"'")+";\r\n";
00559 
00560                         //Update the final strings
00561                         WriteHeader();
00562                         WriteFooter();
00563                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
00564                 else ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
00565         };

00577 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::Optioncombo_SelectedIndexChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e)

00580         optionstring="";
00581         
00582         //Garlic function , print the Method comobox (1st panel)
00583         if (easyspinfunction==0)
00584                 optionstring="Opt.Method = '"+ GarlicMethodcombo->SelectedItem+"' ;\r\n";
00585 
00586         //Chilli function , print the Output and Verbosity comobox (2nd panel)
00587         if (easyspinfunction==1) 
00588         {
00589                 optionstring="Opt.Output = '"+ chiliOutputcombo->SelectedItem+"' ;\r\n";
00590                 optionstring+="Opt.Verbosity = "+ chiliVerbcombo->SelectedIndex+" ;\r\n";
00591         };
00592 
00593         //Pepper function , print the Method, Output, Symmetry and Verbosity comobox (3rd panel)
00594         if (easyspinfunction==2) 
00595         {
00596                 optionstring="Opt.Method = '"+ PepperMethodcombo->SelectedItem+"' ;\r\n";
00597                 optionstring+="Opt.Output = '"+ PepperOutputcombo->SelectedItem+"' ;\r\n";
00598                 optionstring+="Opt.Symmetry = '"+ Symmetrycombo->SelectedItem+"' ;\r\n";
00599                 optionstring+="Opt.Verbosity = "+ PepperVerbcombo->SelectedIndex+" ;\r\n";
00600         };
00601 
00602         //Update the final strings
00603         WriteHeader();
00604         WriteFooter();
00605 }
00606 
00607 /**
00608 * @brief EventHandler for Numerix boxes in Options tab
00609 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00610 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00611 */
00612 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::Optnumeric_ValueChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e)
00613 {
00614         //Clear the string
00615         option2string="";
00616 
00617         //Chilli function , print the MOMD, knots and Director tilt values (2nd panel)
00618         if (easyspinfunction==1)
00619         {
00620                 option2string="Exp.MOMD = "+(MOMDcheckBox->Checked? "1": "0")+";\r\n"+
00621                         (MOMDcheckBox->Checked? "Opt.nKnots = "+ChillKnotsnumeric->Value+";\r\n":"")+
00622                         (MOMDcheckBox->Checked? "":"Exp.psi = "+psitextBox->Text+";\r\n");
00623         }
00624         
00625         //Pepper function , print the threshold, knots, interpolate, cutoff and intensity values (3nd panel)
00626         if (easyspinfunction==2) //pepper
00627         {
00628                 option2string="Opt.nKnots = ["+ pepKnotsnumeric->Value+
00629                         (IntercheckBox->Checked? " "+ Interpnumeric->Value+"]" : " 0]")+";\r\n"+
00630                         "Opt.Threshold = "+pow(10.0,Convert::ToDouble(Thresnumeric->Value))+";\r\n"+
00631                         "Opt.IsoCutoff = "+pow(10.0,Convert::ToDouble(Isonumeric->Value))+";\r\n"+
00632                         "Opt.Intensity = "+(IntenscheckBox->Checked? "'on'": "'off'")+";\r\n";
00633         };
00634 
00635         //Update the final strings
00636         WriteHeader();
00637         WriteFooter();
00638 }

00640 /**
00641 * @brief EventHandler for check boxes in Options tab
00642 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00643 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00644 */
00645 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::Opt_checkBox_CheckedChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) 
00646 {
00647         //Chili function, depending the MOMD check box, enable or disable different field (2nd panel)
00648         if (easyspinfunction==1) 
00649         {
00650                 ChillKnotsnumeric->Enabled=MOMDcheckBox->Checked;
00651                 Knotslabel->Enabled=MOMDcheckBox->Checked;
00652                 psilabel->Enabled=!MOMDcheckBox->Checked;
00653                 psitextBox->Enabled=!MOMDcheckBox->Checked;
00654         }
00655 
00656         //Pepper function, depending the interpolate check box , enable numeric field next to it (3nd panel)
00657         else if (easyspinfunction==2) 
00658         {
00659                 Interpnumeric->Enabled=IntercheckBox->Checked;
00660         };
00661 
00662         //Update hte numerics values
00663         Optnumeric_ValueChanged(gcnew NumericUpDown(), gcnew System::EventArgs());
00664 
00665         //Update the final strings
00666         WriteHeader();
00667         WriteFooter();
00668 }

00670 /**
00671 * @brief EventHandler for text boxes in Options tab
00672 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00673 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00674 */
00675 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::Opt_textBox_KeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
00676 {
00677         //Clear the string
00678         option2string="";
00679 
00680         //If key pressed is not number, or . or backspace or enter do nothing
00681         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
00682         {
00683                 e->Handled = true;
00684         }
00685         else
00686         {
00687                 //When enter is hitted and chilli function
00688                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13 && easyspinfunction==1)
00689                 {
00690                         //Returned to original color of the textbox
00691                         ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
00692 
00693                         //If one the below text fields is not empty, update text field
00694                         if(EvenLMaxtext->Text!="" || OddLMaxtext->Text!="" || EvenKMaxtext->Text!=""||
00695                                 OddMMaxtext->Text!="" )
00696                         {
00697                                 //For the empty texboxes set value zero
00698                                 if(EvenLMaxtext->Text=="") EvenLMaxtext->Text="0";
00699                                 if(OddLMaxtext->Text=="") OddLMaxtext->Text="0";
00700                                 if(EvenKMaxtext->Text=="") EvenKMaxtext->Text="0";
00701                                 if(OddMMaxtext->Text=="") OddMMaxtext->Text="0";
00702 
00703                                 //Write LKLM  parameters in correct format
00704                                 option2string="Opt.LLKM = ["+EvenLMaxtext->Text+" "+
00705                                         OddLMaxtext->Text+" "+ EvenKMaxtext->Text+" "+OddMMaxtext->Text+"];\r\n";
00706                         }
00707 
00708                         //Write Director tilt parameter in correct format if MOMD checked
00709                         option2string+=(MOMDcheckBox->Checked? "":"Exp.psi = "+psitextBox->Text+";\r\n");
00710 
00711                         //Update the final strings
00712                         WriteHeader();
00713                         WriteFooter();
00714 
00715                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
00716                 else ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
00717         };
00718 }

00724 /**
00725 * @brief EventHandler for convolutions parameters in Broadenings tab
00726 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00727 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00728 */
00729 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::convolutionBoxKeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
00730 {
00731         //Clear the string
00732         broadeningstring="";
00733 
00734         //If key pressed is not number, or . or backspace or enter do nothing
00735         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13 )
00736         {
00737                 e->Handled = true;
00738         }
00739         else
00740         {
00741                 //When enter is hitted
00742                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13 )
00743                 {
00744                         //Returned to original color of the textbox
00745                         ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
00746 
00747                         //Choose between Gaussian and Lorentzian FWHM or pp
00748                         switch(Convert::ToInt32((String^)(((TextBox^)sender)->Tag))) {
00749                         case 1://Gaussian FWHM to pp
00750 
00751                                 //For not empty text box
00752                                 if(((TextBox^)sender)->Text!="")
00753                                 {
00754                                         //Convert from FWHM to pp
00755                                         Gaussianpptext->Text=To_String(Convert::ToDouble(
00756                                                 GaussianFWHMtext->Text)/sqrt(2.0*log(2.0)));
00757                                 }
00758                                 else ///if FWHM text empty set also pp empty
00759                                         Gaussianpptext->Text="";
00760 
00761                                 break;
00762 
00763                         case 2://Gaussian pp to FWHM
00764 
00765                                 //For not empty text box
00766                                 if(((TextBox^)sender)->Text!="")
00767                                 {
00768                                         //Convert from pp to FWHM
00769                                         GaussianFWHMtext->Text=To_String(Convert::ToDouble(
00770                                                 Gaussianpptext->Text)*sqrt(2.0*log(2.0)));
00771                                 }
00772                                 else ///if pp text empty set also FWHM empty
00773                                         GaussianFWHMtext->Text="";
00774 
00775                                 break;
00776 
00777                         case 3://Lorentzian FWHM to pp
00778 
00779                                 //For not empty text box
00780                                 if(((TextBox^)sender)->Text!="")
00781                                 {
00782                                         //Convert from FWHM to pp
00783                                         Lorentzianpptext->Text=To_String(Convert::ToDouble(
00784                                                 LorentzianFWHMtext->Text)/sqrt(3.0));
00785                                 }
00786                                 else ///if FWHM text empty set also pp empty
00787                                         Lorentzianpptext->Text="";
00788 
00789                                 break;
00790 
00791                         case 4://Lorentzian pp to FWHM
00792 
00793                                 //For not empty text box
00794                                 if(((TextBox^)sender)->Text!="")
00795                                 {
00796                                         //Convert from pp to FWHM
00797                                         LorentzianFWHMtext->Text=To_String(Convert::ToDouble(
00798                                                 Lorentzianpptext->Text)*sqrt(3.0));
00799                                 }
00800                                 else ///if pp text empty set also FWHM empty
00801                                         LorentzianFWHMtext->Text!="";
00802 
00803                                 break;
00804 
00805                         };
00806 
00807                         //If Lorentzian is empty, and Gaussian ont write Gaussian
00808                         if(Lorentzianpptext->Text=="" && Gaussianpptext->Text!="")
00809                         {
00810                                 //Write Gaussian in the appropriate format
00811                                 broadeningstring="Sys.lwpp = " +unitconv(Gaussianpptext->Text,Units::Gauss,BroadUnitscombo->Text)+";\r\n";
00812                         }//If Lorentzian is not empty, write both if Gaussian not empty
00813                         else if(Lorentzianpptext->Text!="")
00814                         {
00815                                 //Write Lorentzian and Gaussian in the appropriate format
00816                                 broadeningstring="Sys.lwpp = ["+(Gaussianpptext->Text==""?"0":
00817                                         unitconv(Gaussianpptext->Text,Units::Gauss,BroadUnitscombo->Text))+
00818                                         " "+ unitconv(Lorentzianpptext->Text,Units::Gauss,BroadUnitscombo->Text)+"];\r\n";
00819                         }
00820 
00821                         //Update the final strings
00822                         WriteHeader();
00823                         WriteFooter();
00824 
00825                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
00826                 else ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
00827         };
00828 }
00829 
00830 /**
00831 * @brief EventHandler for anisotropic parameters in Broadenings tab
00832 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00833 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00834 */
00835 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::Anisotropic_text_KeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
00836 {
00837         //Clear the string
00838         broadening1string="";
00839 
00840         //If key pressed is not number, or . or backspace or enter do nothing
00841         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
00842         {
00843                 e->Handled = true;
00844         }
00845         else
00846         {
00847                 //When enter is hitted and pepper is choosen
00848                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13 && easyspinfunction==2)
00849                 {
00850                         //Returned to original color of the textbox
00851                         ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
00852 
00853                         //if any of Hstrain parameters are not empty
00854                         if(HStrainxtext->Text!="" || HStrainytext->Text!="" ||  HStrainztext->Text!="" )
00855                         {
00856                                 //Set the other parameters which are empty to zero
00857                                 if(HStrainxtext->Text=="") HStrainxtext->Text="0";
00858                                 if(HStrainytext->Text=="") HStrainytext->Text="0";
00859                                 if(HStrainztext->Text=="") HStrainztext->Text="0";
00860 
00861                                 //Write the final string in the appropriate format
00862                                 broadening1string+="Sys.HStrain = ["+ HStrainxtext->Text+" "+
00863                                         HStrainytext->Text+" "+
00864                                         HStrainztext->Text+"];\r\n";
00865                         }; 
00866 
00867                         //if any of gstrain parameters are not empty
00868                         if(gStrainxtext->Text!="" || gStrainytext->Text!="" || gStrainztext->Text!="" )
00869                         {
00870                                 //Set the other parameters which are empty to zero
00871                                 if(gStrainxtext->Text=="") gStrainxtext->Text="0";
00872                                 if(gStrainytext->Text=="") gStrainytext->Text="0";
00873                                 if(gStrainztext->Text=="") gStrainztext->Text="0";
00874 
00875                                 //Write the final string in the appropriate format
00876                                 broadening1string+="Sys.gStrain = ["+ gStrainxtext->Text+" "+
00877                                         gStrainytext->Text+" "+
00878                                         gStrainztext->Text+"];\r\n";
00879                         };
00880 
00881                         //if any of Astrain parameters are not empty
00882                         if(AStrainxtext->Text!="" || AStrainytext->Text!="" || AStrainztext->Text!="" )
00883                         {
00884                                 //Set the other parameters which are empty to zero
00885                                 if(AStrainxtext->Text=="") AStrainxtext->Text="0";
00886                                 if(AStrainytext->Text=="") AStrainytext->Text="0";
00887                                 if(AStrainztext->Text=="") AStrainztext->Text="0";
00888 
00889                                 //Write the final string in the appropriate format
00890                                 broadening1string+="Sys.AStrain = ["+ AStrainxtext->Text+" "+
00891                                         AStrainytext->Text+" "+
00892                                         AStrainztext->Text+"];\r\n";
00893                         };
00894 
00895                         //if any of Dstrain parameters are not empty
00896                         if(DStrainDtext->Text!="" || DStrainEtext->Text!="" )
00897                         {
00898                                 //Set the other parameters which are empty to zero
00899                                 if(DStrainDtext->Text=="") DStrainDtext->Text="0";
00900                                 if(DStrainEtext->Text=="") DStrainDtext->Text="0";
00901 
00902                                 //Write the final string in the appropriate format if corr is empty else write evrything
00903                                 if(DStraincorrtext->Text=="") broadening1string+="Sys.DStrain = ["+ DStrainDtext->Text+" "+ DStrainEtext->Text+"];\r\n";
00904                                 else broadening1string+="Sys.DStrain = ["+ DStrainDtext->Text+" "+
00905                                         DStrainEtext->Text+" "+
00906                                         DStraincorrtext->Text+"];\r\n";
00907                         };
00908 
00909                         //Update the final strings
00910                         WriteHeader();
00911                         WriteFooter();
00912 
00913                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
00914                 else ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
00915         };
00916 }

00922 /**
00923 * @brief EventHandler for rotational radio button of Dynamics tab
00924 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00925 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00926 */
00927 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::radioButton_diffusion_CheckedChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) 
00928 {
00929         //Choose between isotorpic or axial or rhombic diffusion to enable respective panels
00930         switch(Convert::ToInt32((String^)(((RadioButton^)sender)->Tag))) {
00931         case 1:  //isotropic
00932                 isotropicpanel->Visible=true;
00933                 axialpanel->Visible=false;
00934                 rhombicpanel->Visible=false;
00935                 isotropicpanel->Location=System::Drawing::Point(3, 83);
00936                 break;
00937         case 2:  //axial
00938                 isotropicpanel->Visible=false;
00939                 axialpanel->Location=System::Drawing::Point(3, 83);
00940                 axialpanel->Visible=true;
00941                 rhombicpanel->Visible=false;
00942                 break;
00943         case 3:  //rhombic
00944                 isotropicpanel->Visible=false;
00945                 axialpanel->Visible=false;
00946                 rhombicpanel->Visible=true;
00947                 rhombicpanel->Location=System::Drawing::Point(3, 83);
00948                 break;
00949 
00950         };
00951 
00952         //Set the postion of the paneles
00953         DynamicsgroupBox->Size=System::Drawing::Size(396,220);
00954         RotationallogcheckBox->Location=System::Drawing::Point(12, 185);
00955         OrderinggroupBox->Location=System::Drawing::Point(3, 225);
00956         Heisenbergpanel->Location=System::Drawing::Point(6, 335);
00957 }

00959 /**
00960 * @brief EventHandler for diffusion parameters in Dynamics tab
00961 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00962 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00963 */
00964 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::textBoxDynamics_KeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
00965 {
00966         dynamicstring="";       //Clear the string
00967         String^ temp;
00968         Unit^ unit;
00969 
00970         //If key pressed is not number, or . or backspace or enter do nothing
00971         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
00972         {
00973                 e->Handled = true;
00974         }
00975         else
00976         {
00977                 //When enter is hitted
00978                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13)
00979                 {
00980                         //Returned to original color of the textbox
00981                         ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
00982 
00983                         //for choosing between Corelation time and Diffusion tensor
00984                         switch(Convert::ToInt32((String^)(((TextBox^)sender)->Tag))) {
00985                         case 1: //When writing correlation time, we change also diffusion auto
00986 
00987                                 //Isotropic diffusion and when the text is not empty
00988                                 if(isocorrtext->Text!="" )
00989                                 {
00990                                         //Set the units for diffusion tensor
00991                                         if(DiffIsoUnitscombo->Text=="GHz") unit=Units::GHz;
00992                                         else  unit=Units::MHz;
00993 
00994                                         //Save the text for time after conversion to chosen SI units 
00995                                         temp=unitconv(isocorrtext->Text,Units::seconds,IsoUnitscombo->Text);
00996 
00997                                         //Calulate the diffusion tensor from the correlation 
00998                                         //time and convert to selected units
00999                                         isodifftext->Text=unitconv(Convert::ToString(1.0f/(6.0f*Convert::ToDouble(temp))),
01000                                                 unit,Units::Hz->get_name());
01001                                 } //if time text empty set also tensor empty
01002                                 else
01003                                         isodifftext->Text="";
01004 
01005                                 //axial anisotropic diffusion xy and when the text is not empty
01006                                 if(axcorrxytext->Text!="")
01007                                 {
01008                                         //Set the units for diffusion tensor
01009                                         if(DiffAxUnitscombo->Text=="GHz") unit=Units::GHz;
01010                                         else  unit=Units::MHz;
01011 
01012                                         //Save the text for time after conversion to chosen SI units 
01013                                         temp=unitconv(axcorrxytext->Text,Units::seconds,AxUnitscombo->Text);
01014 
01015                                         //Calulate the diffusion tensor from the correlation 
01016                                         //time and convert to selected units
01017                                         axdiffxytext->Text=unitconv(Convert::ToString(1.0f/(6.0f*Convert::ToDouble(temp))),
01018                                                 unit,Units::Hz->get_name());
01019                                 } //if time text empty set also tensor empty
01020                                 else 
01021                                         axdiffxytext->Text="";
01022 
01023                                 //axial anisotropic diffusion z and when the text is not empty
01024                                 if(axcorrztext->Text!="")
01025                                 {
01026                                         //Set the units for diffusion tensor
01027                                         if(DiffAxUnitscombo->Text=="GHz") unit=Units::GHz;
01028                                         else  unit=Units::MHz;
01029 
01030                                         //Save the text for time after conversion to chosen SI units 
01031                                         temp=unitconv(axcorrztext->Text,Units::seconds,AxUnitscombo->Text);
01032 
01033                                         //Calulate the diffusion tensor from the correlation 
01034                                         //time and convert to selected units
01035                                         axdiffztext->Text=unitconv(Convert::ToString(1.0f/(6.0f*Convert::ToDouble(temp))),
01036                                                 unit,Units::Hz->get_name());
01037                                 } //if time text empty set also tensor empty
01038                                 else
01039                                         axdiffztext->Text="";
01040 
01041                                 //rhombic anisotropic diffusion x and when the text is not empty
01042                                 if(corrxtext->Text!="")
01043                                 {
01044                                         //Set the units for diffusion tensor
01045                                         if(DiffRhUnitscombo->Text=="GHz") unit=Units::GHz;
01046                                         else  unit=Units::MHz;
01047 
01048                                         //Save the text for time after conversion to chosen SI units 
01049                                         temp=unitconv(corrxtext->Text,Units::seconds,RhUnitscombo->Text);
01050 
01051                                         //Calulate the diffusion tensor from the correlation 
01052                                         //time and convert to selected units
01053                                         diffxtext->Text=unitconv(Convert::ToString(1.0f/(6.0f*Convert::ToDouble(temp))),
01054                                                 unit,Units::Hz->get_name());
01055                                 } //if time text empty set also tensor empty
01056                                 else
01057                                         diffxtext->Text="";
01058 
01059                                 //rhombic anisotropic diffusion y and when the text is not empty
01060                                 if(corrytext->Text!="")
01061                                 {
01062                                         //Set the units for diffusion tensor
01063                                         if(DiffRhUnitscombo->Text=="GHz") unit=Units::GHz;
01064                                         else  unit=Units::MHz;
01065 
01066                                         //Save the text for time after conversion to chosen SI units 
01067                                         temp=unitconv(corrytext->Text,Units::seconds,RhUnitscombo->Text);
01068 
01069                                         //Calulate the diffusion tensor from the correlation 
01070                                         //time and convert to selected units
01071                                         diffytext->Text=unitconv(Convert::ToString(1.0f/(6.0f*Convert::ToDouble(temp))),
01072                                                 unit,Units::Hz->get_name());
01073                                 } //if time text empty set also tensor empty
01074                                 else
01075                                         diffytext->Text="";
01076 
01077                                 //rhombic anisotropic diffusion z and when the text is not empty
01078                                 if(corrztext->Text!="")
01079                                 {
01080                                         //Set the units for diffusion tensor
01081                                         if(DiffRhUnitscombo->Text=="GHz") unit=Units::GHz;
01082                                         else  unit=Units::MHz;
01083 
01084                                         //Save the text for time after conversion to chosen SI units 
01085                                         temp=unitconv(corrztext->Text,Units::seconds,RhUnitscombo->Text);
01086 
01087                                         //Calulate the diffusion tensor from the correlation 
01088                                         //time and convert to selected units
01089                                         diffztext->Text=unitconv(Convert::ToString(1.0f/(6.0f*Convert::ToDouble(temp))),
01090                                                 unit,Units::Hz->get_name());
01091                                 }
01092                                 else//if time text empty set also tensor empty
01093                                         diffztext->Text="";
01094 
01095                                 break;  
01096                                 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
01097 
01098                         case 2: //When writing diffusion tensor, we change also time auto
01099 
01100                                 ///Isotropic time and when the text is not empty
01101                                 if(isodifftext->Text!="")
01102                                 {
01103                                         //Set the units for correlation time
01104                                         if(IsoUnitscombo->Text=="ns") unit=Units::nsec;
01105                                         else  unit=Units::mi_sec;
01106 
01107                                         //Save the text for tensor after conversion to chosen SI units 
01108                                         temp=unitconv(isodifftext->Text,Units::Hz,DiffIsoUnitscombo->Text);
01109 
01110                                         //Calulate the correlation time from the diffusion 
01111                                         //tensor and convert to selected units
01112                                         isocorrtext->Text=unitconv(Convert::ToString(1.0f/(6.0f*Convert::ToDouble(temp))),
01113                                                 unit,Units::seconds->get_name());
01114                                 } //if tensor text empty set also time empty
01115                                 else
01116                                         isocorrtext->Text="";
01117 
01118                                 //Axial anisotropic time xy and when the text is not empty
01119                                 if(axdiffxytext->Text!="")
01120                                 {
01121                                         //Set the units for correlation time
01122                                         if(AxUnitscombo->Text=="ns") unit=Units::nsec;
01123                                         else  unit=Units::mi_sec;
01124 
01125                                         //Save the text for tensor after conversion to chosen SI units
01126                                         temp=unitconv(axdiffxytext->Text,Units::Hz,DiffAxUnitscombo->Text);
01127 
01128                                         //Calulate the correlation time from the diffusion 
01129                                         //tensor and convert to selected units
01130                                         axcorrxytext->Text=unitconv(Convert::ToString(1.0f/(6.0f*Convert::ToDouble(temp))),
01131                                                 unit,Units::seconds->get_name());
01132                                 }//if tensor text empty set also time empty
01133                                 else 
01134                                         axcorrxytext->Text="";
01135 
01136                                 //Axial anisotropic time z and when the text is not empty
01137                                 if(axdiffztext->Text!="")
01138                                 {
01139                                         //Set the units for correlation time
01140                                         if(AxUnitscombo->Text=="ns") unit=Units::nsec;
01141                                         else  unit=Units::mi_sec;
01142 
01143                                         //Save the text for tensor after conversion to chosen SI units
01144                                         temp=unitconv(axdiffztext->Text,Units::Hz,DiffAxUnitscombo->Text);
01145 
01146                                         //Calulate the correlation time from the diffusion 
01147                                         //tensor and convert to selected units
01148                                         axcorrztext->Text=unitconv(Convert::ToString(1.0f/(6.0f*Convert::ToDouble(temp))),
01149                                                 unit,Units::seconds->get_name());
01150                                 }//if tensor text empty set also time empty
01151                                 else
01152                                         axcorrztext->Text="";
01153 
01154                                 //rhombic anisotropic time x and when the text is not empty
01155                                 if(diffxtext->Text!="")
01156                                 {
01157                                         //Set the units for correlation time
01158                                         if(RhUnitscombo->Text=="ns") unit=Units::nsec;
01159                                         else  unit=Units::mi_sec;
01160 
01161                                         //Save the text for tensor after conversion to chosen SI units
01162                                         temp=unitconv(diffxtext->Text,Units::Hz,DiffRhUnitscombo->Text);
01163 
01164                                         //Calulate the correlation time from the diffusion 
01165                                         //tensor and convert to selected units
01166                                         corrxtext->Text=unitconv(Convert::ToString(1.0f/(6.0f*Convert::ToDouble(temp))),
01167                                                 unit,Units::seconds->get_name());
01168                                 }//if tensor text empty set also time empty
01169                                 else
01170                                         corrxtext->Text="";
01171 
01172                                 //rhombic anisotropic time y and when the text is not empty
01173                                 if(diffytext->Text!="")
01174                                 {
01175                                         //Set the units for correlation time
01176                                         if(RhUnitscombo->Text=="ns") unit=Units::nsec;
01177                                         else  unit=Units::mi_sec;
01178 
01179                                         //Save the text for tensor after conversion to chosen SI units
01180                                         temp=unitconv(diffytext->Text,Units::Hz,DiffRhUnitscombo->Text);
01181 
01182                                         //Calulate the correlation time from the diffusion 
01183                                         //tensor and convert to selected units
01184                                         corrytext->Text=unitconv(Convert::ToString(1.0f/(6.0f*Convert::ToDouble(temp))),
01185                                                 unit,Units::seconds->get_name());
01186                                 }//if tensor text empty set also time empty
01187                                 else
01188                                         corrytext->Text="";
01189 
01190                                 //rhombic anisotropic time z and when the text is not empty
01191                                 if(diffztext->Text!="")
01192                                 {
01193                                         //Set the units for correlation time
01194                                         if(RhUnitscombo->Text=="ns") unit=Units::nsec;
01195                                         else  unit=Units::mi_sec;
01196 
01197                                         //Save the text for tensor after conversion to chosen SI units
01198                                         temp=unitconv(diffztext->Text,Units::Hz,DiffRhUnitscombo->Text);
01199 
01200                                         //Calulate the correlation time from the diffusion 
01201                                         //tensor and convert to selected units
01202                                         corrztext->Text=unitconv(Convert::ToString(1.0f/(6.0f*Convert::ToDouble(temp))),
01203                                                 unit,Units::seconds->get_name());
01204                                 }//if tensor text empty set also time empty
01205                                 else
01206                                         corrztext->Text="";
01207 
01208                                 break;
01209                         };
01210 
01211                         //When the isotropic diffusion is selected, write parameters to the 
01212                         //appropriate format is SI unit. If log is enable write them in log form.
01213                         if(Isotropicradio->Checked) dynamicstring="Sys.tcorr = " +
01214                                 (RotationallogcheckBox->Checked?
01215                                 unitconv(logtext(isocorrtext->Text),Units::seconds,IsoUnitscombo->Text):
01216                                 unitconv(isocorrtext->Text,Units::seconds,IsoUnitscombo->Text))+";\r\n";
01217 
01218                         //When the axial anisotropic diffusion is selected, write parameters to the 
01219                         //appropriate format is SI unit. If log is enable write them in log form.
01220                         if(Axialradio->Checked) dynamicstring="Sys.tcorr = [" +
01221                                 (RotationallogcheckBox->Checked?
01222                                 unitconv(logtext(axcorrxytext->Text),Units::seconds,AxUnitscombo->Text):
01223                                 unitconv(axcorrxytext->Text,Units::seconds,AxUnitscombo->Text))+" "+
01224                                 (RotationallogcheckBox->Checked?
01225                                 unitconv(logtext(axcorrztext->Text),Units::seconds,AxUnitscombo->Text):
01226                                 unitconv(axcorrztext->Text,Units::seconds,AxUnitscombo->Text))+"];\r\n";
01227 
01228                         //When the rhombic aniisotropic diffusion is selected, write parameters to the 
01229                         //appropriate format is SI unit. If log is enable write them in log form.
01230                         if(Rhombicradio->Checked) dynamicstring="Sys.tcorr =[ " +
01231                                 (RotationallogcheckBox->Checked?
01232                                 unitconv(logtext(corrxtext->Text),Units::seconds,RhUnitscombo->Text):
01233                                 unitconv(corrxtext->Text,Units::seconds,RhUnitscombo->Text))+" "+
01234                                 (RotationallogcheckBox->Checked?
01235                                 unitconv(logtext(corrytext->Text),Units::seconds,RhUnitscombo->Text):
01236                                 unitconv(corrytext->Text,Units::seconds,RhUnitscombo->Text))+" "+
01237                                 (RotationallogcheckBox->Checked?
01238                                 unitconv(logtext(corrztext->Text),Units::seconds,RhUnitscombo->Text):
01239                                 unitconv(corrztext->Text,Units::seconds,RhUnitscombo->Text))+" "+"];\r\n";
01240 
01241                         //Update the final strings
01242                         WriteHeader();
01243                         WriteFooter();
01244 
01245                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
01246                 else ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
01247         };
01248 }
01249 
01250 /**
01251 * @brief EventHandler for ordering potential parameters in Dynamics tab
01252 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
01253 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
01254 */
01255 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::orderheisentext_KeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
01256 {
01257         //Clear the string
01258         dynamic1string="";
01259 
01260         //If key pressed is not number, or . or backspace or enter do nothing
01261         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
01262         {
01263                 e->Handled = true;
01264         }
01265         else
01266         {
01267                 //When enter is hitted and chili is enabled
01268                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13 && easyspinfunction==1)
01269                 {
01270                         //Returned to original color of the textbox
01271                         ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
01272 
01273                         //If one the below text fields is not empty, update text field
01274                         if(l20text->Text!="" || l22text->Text!="" || l40text->Text!=""||
01275                                 l42text->Text!="" || l44text->Text!="" )
01276                         {
01277                                 //For the empty texboxes set value zero
01278                                 if(l20text->Text=="") l20text->Text="0";
01279                                 if(l22text->Text=="") l22text->Text="0";
01280                                 if(l40text->Text=="") l40text->Text="0";
01281                                 if(l42text->Text=="") l42text->Text="0";
01282                                 if(l44text->Text=="") l44text->Text="0";
01283 
01284                                 //Write lambda  parameters in correct format
01285                                 dynamic1string="Sys.labda = ["+ l20text->Text+" "+l22text->Text+" "+l40text->Text+
01286                                         " "+l42text->Text+" "+l44text->Text+" "+"];\r\n";
01287                         } 
01288 
01289                         //If heisenberg textbox is not empty write/update in the final string
01290                         if(heisentext->Text!="") dynamic1string+="Sys.Exchange = "+heisentext->Text+";\r\n";
01291 
01292                         //Update the final strings
01293                         WriteHeader();
01294                         WriteFooter();
01295 
01296                 } //When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
01297                 else ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
01298         };
01299 }

01305 /**
01306 * @brief EventHandler for when a unit is selected using units combobox
01307 * in Broadenings tab and Experiment tab.
01308 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
01309 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
01310 */
01311 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::Unitscombo_SelectedIndexChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e)
01312 {
01313         switch(Convert::ToInt32((String^)(((ComboBox^)sender)->Tag))) 
01314         {
01315         case 1: //For updating convolutions textboxes in Broadenings tab, hitting enter (char)13
01316                 convolutionBoxKeyPress(gcnew TextBox(),gcnew KeyPressEventArgs((char)13));
01317                 break;
01318         case 2: //For updating top textboxes in Experiment tab, hitting enter (char)13
01319                 ExperimenttextBoxKeyPress(gcnew TextBox(),gcnew KeyPressEventArgs((char)13));
01320                 break;
01321         };
01322 }

01324 /**
01325 * @brief EventHandler for when a unit is selected using units combobox in Dynamics Tab
01326 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
01327 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
01328 */
01329  System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::DynamicsUnitscombo_SelectedIndexChanged(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e) 
01330  {
01331          //Choose tag 
01332          TextBox^ textbox=gcnew TextBox();
01333          textbox->Tag=(String^)(((ComboBox^)sender)->Tag);
01334 
01335          //Update textboxes in Dynamics tab, hitting enter (char)13
01336          textBoxDynamics_KeyPress(textbox,gcnew KeyPressEventArgs((char)13));
01337  }

01341 #pragma region Preview Box
01342 
01343  /**
01344 * @brief EventHandler for when we move the mouse with mouse button down, hand effect.
01345 * Not perfect from times to times crash.
01346 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
01347 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
01348 */
01349  System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::PreviewtextBox_MouseMove(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::MouseEventArgs^  e) 
01350  {
01351          //Only for left button
01352          if( e->Button == System::Windows::Forms::MouseButtons::Left)
01353          {
01354                  //for the X coordinate
01355                  int tempX=panel2->HorizontalScroll->Value+2*(InitialPoint->X-e->Location.X);
01356 
01357                  //The value of position should be inside the range of horizontal scroll
01358                  if(tempX>panel2->HorizontalScroll->Minimum && tempX<panel2->HorizontalScroll->Maximum)
01359                  {
01360                          //Set the value of the Horizontal scroll
01361                          panel2->HorizontalScroll->Value+=2*(InitialPoint->X-e->Location.X);
01362 
01363                          //Reset the initial point
01364                          InitialPoint->X=e->Location.X;
01365                  }
01366 
01367                  //for the Y coordinate
01368                  int tempY=panel2->VerticalScroll->Value+2*(InitialPoint->Y-e->Location.Y);
01369 
01370                  //The value of position should be inside the range of Vertical scroll
01371                  if(tempY>panel2->VerticalScroll->Minimum && tempY<panel2->VerticalScroll->Maximum)
01372                  {
01373                          //Set the value of the Vertical scroll
01374                          panel2->VerticalScroll->Value+=2*(InitialPoint->Y-e->Location.Y);
01375 
01376                          //Reset the initial point
01377                          InitialPoint->Y=e->Location.Y;
01378                  }
01379          }
01380  }
01381 
01382  /**
01383 * @brief EventHandler for when we press mouse button down to save initial position.
01384 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
01385 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
01386 */
01387 System::Void SpinachGUI::EasySpin::PreviewtextBox_MouseDown(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::MouseEventArgs^  e) 
01388 {
01389         //Save initial position and then fire mouseMove
01390         InitialPoint=e->Location;
01391         PreviewtextBox_MouseMove(sender,e);
01392 }
